subject: What is an OEM and which is better to buy?
body:
Who ever loved that loved not at first sight?

Don't forget your great guns, which are the most respectable arguments of the rights of kings.

Friendship is like a bank account. You can't continue to draw on it without making deposits.

Feed your faith and doubt will starve to death

One should not be too severe on English novels they are the only relaxation of the intellectually unemployed.

A failure is a man who has blundered, but is not able to cash in on the experience.

The energy of the mind is the essence of life.

Man ceased to be an ape, vanquished the ape, on the day the first book was written.

Hope is the parent of faith.

What you hear repeatedly you will eventually believe.

Before you beat a child, be sure yourself are not the cause of the offense.

Nothing can confound a wise man more than laughter from a dunce.

For them that think death's honesty won't fall upon them naturally life sometimes must get lonely.
